Projects.Title: Pan Card Tempering Detection

Projects.Objective: Ensure the authenticity of Pan cards by accurately identifying tampered documents.
Projects.Outcome: Achieved a high accuracy rate in detecting tampered Pan cards, significantly improving the reliability of document verification processes.
